problem: 如图,▱ABCD中,AC．BD为对角线,BC=3,BC边上的高为2,则阴影部分的面积为()
answer: 解:∵▱ABCD中,AC．BD为对角线,BC=3,BC边上的高为2,∴S~▱ABCD~=3×2=6,AD∥BC,∴OA=OC,∠OAE=∠OCF,在△AOE和△COF中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠OAE=∠OCF\\OA=OC\\∠AOE=∠COF\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△AOE≌△COF(ASA),∴S~△AOE~=S~△COF~,同理:S~△EOG~=S~△FOH~,S~△DOG~=S~△BOH~,∴S_{阴影}=S~△ABD~=\frac{1}{2}S~▱ABCD~=\frac{1}{2}×6=3．故选:A．
comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质以及全等三角形的判定与性质．此题难度不大,注意掌握数形结合思想的应用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, ▱ABCD, AC. BD is the diagonal, BC = N_0, the height on the side of BC is N_1, then the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
